Detailed Description

Example controller for use with modbridge_node.

Receives teleop input from modbridge_ex_teleop, and feedback from model via modbridge_node. Provides basic controller output to move feedback values to the input values.

Author
Shashank Swaminathan sh.sw.nosp@m.ami2.nosp@m.35@gm.nosp@m.ail..nosp@m.com

Function Documentation

void controlCallback ( const modelica_bridge::ModComm::ConstPtr &  feedback_val)

Receives feedback from the model; calculates and publishes control values. Reads from topic /model_values. Publishes to topic /control_values Only reads MAX_ARRAY length of incoming data - rest is not stored.

Parameters
[in]feedback_valModComm message holding model feedback values
